title: This is you, when its 5 vs 45 teamkills, and you said "Don't surrender, let's just have fun!"
body:
https://i.imgflip.com/mdjon.gif

_Not a pro in making gifs. Still learning, and this is as close as I can get to my point :p_

replies.body:
I actually had a game today where the enemy team was ahead a few thousand gold most of the game, and four of our champions had negative k/d, then our team stormed their base and won.

Anyone got a gif for that?

Well done.
And the FPS being shit is typical of larger Gifs.
